raw_body: NANAYAKKARA – EVA – Beloved wife of late Walter (retired Aero Engineer,​ ex-Air Ceylon),​ mother of late Shirani,​ Anura,​ Chandrika (retired BoC) and Manel (UK),​ mother-in-law of Dharmarathne Munasinghe (retired LECO),​ Tharangani Nikahetiya,​ Anura Gurusinghe (retired BoC) and Deepal Punchihewa (UK),​ beloved grandmother of Dinuke (USA),​ Anuke (DIMO),​ Akila (Connex IT),​ Sandali (Cathay Pacific),​ Semini,​ Vindula (CICT,​ Colombo Port),​ Natasha and Leeshan (UK),​ expired. Cortege leaves residence at 4.15 p.m. from 16A,​ Mallika Mawatha,​ Templers Road,​ Mt.Lavinia,​ on Wednesday,​ 8th May 2024 for cremation at General Cemetery,​ Mount Lavinia.   030041
